definition: distribute (players or teams) so that outstanding teams or players will not meet in the early rounds

sememes.reasoning: The verb 'seed' describes the act of altering the arrangement or distribution of participants within a competitive structure.

participants.reasoning: The 'Somebody' who intentionally performs the action of distributing or ranking the players or teams.
The 'somebody' (referring to players or teams) whose distribution or arrangement is being changed.
